title: Ecco
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Buffet, Mediterranean, German, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafe and restaurant that offers regional and Mediterranean food and fair trade coffee. Has vegan breakfast, a vegan menu with around 4 dishes plus a vegan buffet once a month featuring a faux meat like seitan-schnitzel or tofu-steak. Vegan options at weekend brunch (10am-3pm) with reservation required. Nice atmosphere, free Wi-Fi.
